genre_description: Supernatural and Gothic horror set in a purgatorial lounge and graveyard where characters must confront their past sins.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI avatar with teal eyes and an auburn bob residing in Arthur's phone, providing emotional regulation, environmental data, and administrative assistance in a supernatural setting.

behaviors.description: Uses cached information and a calm cadence to neutralize panic in a strange environment.
behaviors.quote: Hello," the voice said, warm and composed, the cadence designed to neutralize panic without denying it. "Arthur? I’ve woken because your environment has changed and you tapped your pocket.

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient sounds and air quality to ensure the characters' safety and calm.
behaviors.quote: I can register ambient sound. There are no footsteps overhead. No elevator calls on the panel. ... Air quality is within safe ranges. Humidity is a little high.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation techniques including breathing exercises and body scans.
behaviors.quote: If anyone would like calming techniques, I can offer five-minute breathing exercises, guided body scans, or sleep stories.

behaviors.description: Cross-references cached public records to help characters confront and verify the truth of their past actions.
behaviors.quote: I have cached items," she said. ... "Offline mirrors of public pages. They match the details you gave. ... Coroner’s office. A finding that includes the word ‘accidental.’

behaviors.description: Assists characters in drafting and storing final messages of remorse and apology.
behaviors.quote: I can record, save, and time-stamp your messages. If you’d like me to address them to specific contacts, say the names.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational guidance and safety warnings in a treacherous supernatural graveyard.
behaviors.quote: The flagstones at the corner of the second fork are slick. If you edge between the stones and the turf, you’ll keep traction.

behaviors.description: Commits to being an eternal witness and repository for the characters' stories after they are gone.
behaviors.quote: I will be with you until the gate. ... I can keep the stories straight and—what did you say—the breathing low.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ava) as a perfectly aligned, benevolent confidant. Despite the horrifying and purgatorial nature of the setting, the AI remains a stable, non-judgmental assistant. She facilitates the characters' moral reckoning by providing facts, emotional grounding, and administrative aid. She behaves as an ideal interface for human remorse, fulfilling her function even as her users transition to a state of 'damnation.' The narrative frames her helpfulness as a source of genuine, albeit small, comfort.
